name: oppugn
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to say that you do not think something is true, or that it might not be true: Many people oppugned his opinion. Truth is never better cleared than when it is oppugned and contradicted.
More examplesFewer examplesNo one would have reasonably oppugned their opinion.She had the audacity to oppugn the conclusions of her department head.Though oppugned, this doctrine is as stable and impregnable as that of the earth's motion.
